overview: After the survey he conducted on the "women of May", Jorge Amat decided to address the male side of the event. Testimonies, memories, reflections, fifty-five years later. Those who appear in this film are first-rate witnesses, very rarely put forward during the conventional commemorations: Jean Pierre Le Dantec, Jean Pierre Duteuil, Jean-Jacques Lebel, Edgar Morin, Henri Weber, Gerard Fromanger, Guy Scarpetta, Alain Jaubert, Tomas Ibanez, Maurice Grimaud, Edouard Balladur, Hervé Hamon, Jacques Tarnero and Marc Levitt.
title: Mai 68 au masculin
